# 新概念模拟电路2-负反馈和运算放大器基础

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xin-gainian-moni-dianlu-2-fufankui-he-yunsuan-fangdaqi-jichu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xin-gainian-moni-dianlu-2-fufankui-he-yunsuan-fangdaqi-jichu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xin-gainian-moni-dianlu-2-fufankui-he-yunsuan-fangdaqi-jichu
xin-gainian-moni-dianlu-2-fufankui-he-yunsuan-fangdaqi-jichu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xin-gainian-moni-dianlu-2-fufankui-he-yunsuan-fangdaqi-jichu
xin-gainian-moni-dianlu-2-fufankui-he-yunsuan-fangdaqi-jichu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
